**[Watch the talks](http://vimeo.com/channels/581875)! [See you at GCC2018](https://gccbosc2018.sched.com/)!**

article.content:
Please help get the word out about the 2013 Galaxy Community Conference (GCC2013). A [flier](/src/events/gcc2013/promotion/index.md#flier) suitable for printing is below, as well as several different sizes of the conference banner that can be used on the web. # Flier
Please print, post and distribute the conference flier
at your organization, and or events.
# Graphics
![](/src/images/logos/GCC2013Logo200.png)
![](/src/images/logos/GCC2013TrainingDayLogo200.png)
The conference logos are available in several sizes.
Resolution Conference Training Day
200 px Download Download
400 px Download Download
600 px Download
800 px Download
Full Download Download
# Twitter Hashtag Please use [#usegalaxy](http://twitter.com/#!/search/%23usegalaxy) as the [Twitter hashtag](/src/galaxy-on-twitter/index.md) for the meeting. The obvious choice of #gcc2013 is already well used by several other events. # Sponsorships Interested in sponsoring the meeting? See [Sponsorships](/src/events/gcc2013/sponsorships/index.md).
